item.title: Making Network Animations Using NDTV package
item.description:
The following commands are for making a network animation (moving networks) using R packages statnet and ndtv.

Load packages

library(statnet)
library(ndtv)
library(rio)
library(knitr)

Make GIFs!

## Neither start or onsets specified, assuming start=0
## Onsets and termini not specified, assuming each network in network.list should have a discrete spell of length 1
## Argument base.net not specified, using first element of network.list instead
## Created net.obs.period to describe network
##  Network observation period info:
##   Number of observation spells: 1 
##   Maximal time range observed: 0 until 4 
##   Temporal mode: discrete 
##   Time unit: step 
##   Suggested time increment: 1

renders as

render.d3movie(rivgif,displaylables=FALSE, vertex.col=cols1,
               output.mode = 'HTML',
               script.type = 'embedded')
